amendment.description: An amendment numbered 79 printed in the Congressional Record to limit leasing in the Washington/Oregon Planning Area if the lease would adversely impact coastal fisheries.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to limit leasing in the Washington/Oregon Planning Area if the lease would adversely impact coastal fisheries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perez amendment (A066) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 219 (Roll no. 87).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A066) offered by Ms. Perez.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perez amendment (A066) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 219 (Roll no. 87).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
